name: hell
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 [ S or U ] an extremely unpleasant or difficult place, situation, or experience: sheer hell Work is sheer hell at the moment. The last few months have been absolute hell. See also
hellhole informal
infernal
B2 [ S ] (also Hell) in some religions, the place where some people are believed to go after death to be punished for ever for the bad things they have done during their lives: go to hell I'll go to Hell for this. make someone's life hell informal (also make life hell for someone)
to cause a lot of problems for someone and make them very unhappy: I worked for her for two years and she made my life hell.
